Title: Faking It
Plot: Danny makes a big mistake and blows a con, which makes Mickey question if Danny is right for his crew. Albert is viciously beaten after cheating in a card game and the team decide to wreak revenge the only way that they know how - by playing the long con. The stakes are higher than normal with Albert out of the picture. Can they pull off the con, or will the Mark, a ruthless and violent person, cause even more harm?
GuestStars: David Schall, Robert Pugh, Kevin Dignam, Eamon Geoghegan, John Gillett, Vincenzo Nicoli, Julie Teal, Lola Peploe
